0011000101000000 0010111010000101 1 -> sum: 0101111111000110, cout: 0

1111000110100000 0001000111101000 1 -> sum: 0000001110001001, cout: 1
0010110110101101 1010111110101100 1 -> sum: 1101110101011010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
